de.systemagmbh.interfaces.database
Class CSysDBRException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          de.systemagmbh.interfaces.ASysException
              de.systemagmbh.interfaces.database.CSysDBRException
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysECDOffsets, Serializable
public class CSysDBRException
extends ASysException

Thrown by methods in the implementation of ISysDBRequester class to indicate errors.

Version:
$Revision: 1.13 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int DBR_CLOSE
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when closing the database requester.
static int DBR_CREATING_ISYSTABLE
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when creating an instance of a ISysTable.
static int DBR_INDEX
          This error code indicates that there was a problem getting the index.
static int DBR_INIT
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when initialising the database requester.
static int DBR_INVALID_STMT
          This error code indicates that there was an invalid statement detected.
static int DBR_LOG
          This error code indicates that there was a problem during logging.
static int DBR_MAP
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when mapping the SQL to a String.
static int DBR_OPEN
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when opening the database requester.
static int DBR_READING_ISYSTABLE
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when reading a ISysTable.
static int DBR_SQL
          This error code indicates that there was a SQL error detected.
static int DBR_SQL_DO_COMMIT
          This error code indicates that the commit failed.
static int DBR_SQL_DO_ROLLBACK
          This error code indicates that the rollback failed.
static int DBR_SQL_SET_AUTO_COMMIT
          This error code indicates that setting the auto commit failed.
static int DBR_USAGE
          This error code indicates that there was un unexpected usage.
static int ERROR_DBI_LOAD_CLASS
          This error code indicates that there was a problem when loading the database requester class.
static int ERROR_DBI_NO_CLASS
          This error code indicates that there is no database requester class given.
static int ERROR_DBI_NO_DBR
          This error code indicates that there was a problem loading the database connection class.
static int ERROR_DBI_NO_SUCH_DBR
          This error code indicates that the requested database requester was not found.
protected  SQLException sqlException
          Holds the java.sql.SQLException to provide database specific information

CSysDBRException

public CSysDBRException(int ecd,
                        SQLException sqlException)
Constructs an Exception with no specified detail message. Since version '2-6-0' this constructor also calls Throwable.initCause(java.lang.Throwable).

Parameters:
ecd - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.
sqlException - java.sql.SQLException to provide database specific information
See Also:
ASysException

                        String etx,
                        SQLException sqlException)

Parameters:
ecd - The error code; Components must not use values others than their assigned range.
etx - The detailed message
sqlException - java.sql.SQLException to provide database specific information

Method Detail

getType

public String getType()
Description copied from class: ASysException
Every Implementing class must at least override this.
This must return the corresponding type defined in ISysComponent if available.

Specified by:
getType in class ASysException
Returns:
the component type to that the exception belongs.
See Also:
ASysException

getSQLException

public SQLException getSQLException()
Returns the java.sql.SQLException to get database specific information

Returns:
java.sql.SQLException object or null if not available
